page.title: 04My Home and Family
page.content: I live in Curry Rivel and my address is Springfield House, Church Way, Curry Rivel. There are 5 people in my family. My name is Chloe Langford. I am 10 years old. I have 1 brother called Leon and 1 sister called Laura and a Mum and Dad. I live next to the hair salon called Veronica. My best friend is Suzie Humphreys. My hobbies are swimming, reading and playing games. I have a big house and garden. We have a tyre and a swing in the garden, and a vegetable garden and a flower garden. We have a kitchen, dining room, best room and our bathroom is downstairs. I have a bike which is purple and it is called Skylark. My house is Victorian. I have a friend who lives opposite me and we go to Brownies every Thursday. The Brownie hut is near the church. I have one pet dog called Joe .
